title: Borderlands 2 GOTY [v1.8.2 + 46 DLC][2xDVD5]  Repack by Joker_RE

Build log
[code]Build log:July 07, 2014 v1.8.2 Game Of The Year
-Version v1.8.2 
-Installer Song by DJ PeeTee, download here
-Release completely build
-Based on Borderlands 2: Game of the Year Edition v1.8.2 [ROW] (MULTi8) [Steam-Rip] - RG Origins (Size: 16.69 GB)
-Removed all languages except English. Other languages downloadable from here (7.78GB)
-Reduced repack size :D 8.82GB => 7.48GB
-Reduced install time 35min => 15min
-Abitlity to break into 2xDVD5: -DVD1: Autorun.inf, Setup.exe, Setup-1a.bin, Setup-1b.bin, Setup-1c.bin
 -DVD2; Setup-2a.bin, Setup-2b.bin, Redist

[size=5][color=purple]Some Notes:[/color][/size]
[code]*Installed Game Size: 11.1GB
*Repack Size: 7.28GB
*Game language: English
*Audio language: English Only
*To avoid crash and save errors: always run game as Administrator.

Inorder to get your saves, start the game till claptrap finds you then quit.
Go to My DocumentsMy GamesBorderlands 2WillowGameSaveData
There should be 2 folders there, one containing your saves and one only the profile.bin file, copy your saves into this folder
